game.name: Witch of Eclipse
game.shortDescription: Travel the world as a witch and help the people by defeating threats, going to dungeons in search of materials, and granting other special favors.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Travel the world as a witch and help the people by defeating threats, going to dungeons in search of materials, and granting other special favors.

reviewHighlights.text: Better than Samurai Vandalism, worse than Ideology in Friction and Meritocracy of the Oni & Blade. It's still a pleasure to play even if it suffers a...
Have you ever played a recent OneOne1 JRPG? Yes? Then this review is irrelevant. Art is great and the content behind it is also great. Story is linear...
